GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v5.15.87
GSD.description:
mmc: vub300: fix warning - do not call blocking ops when !TASK_RUNNING

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.87 by commit d58289fc77f8c1f879c818bddaf7ef524c73658b, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit 88095e7b473a3d9ec3b9c60429576e9cbd327c89. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mmc: vub300: fix warning - do not call blocking ops when !TASK_RUNNING
OSV.details:
